output.sentences: During the parade, you could see this male with the two ladies.
We also got to see a woman dressed as a sea monster.
There were so many huge parade props to hold on to.
No doubt this mermaid woman in the purple dress was fantastic.
To top it off, we got to see our favorite transformer while we listened to the theme song.
